entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Arviat
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 2:26 PM CST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Blowing Snow, -35.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Arviat Airport 3:50 PM CST Thursday 02 February 2023
Condition: Blowing Snow
Temperature: -35.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.4 kPa rising
Visibility: 4.8 km
Humidity: 65 %
Wind Chill: -53
Dewpoint: -39.6°C
Wind: NNW 30 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: Clear. Temperature rising to minus 33 by morning.
entry.summary: Clear. Blowing snow early this evening. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 this evening. Temperature rising to minus 33 by morning. Wind chill minus 56 this evening and minus 45 overnight. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Sunny. High minus 31.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 31. Wind chill minus 45 in the morning and minus 37 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 35.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind becoming north 20 km/h overnight. Low minus 35. Wind chill minus 38 in the evening and minus 48 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CST Thursday 02 February 2023
